00040 std::string TShapeSizeOrientB2::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSizeOrientB2"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSizeOrientB2::~TShapeSizeOrientB2() {}
00044 
00045 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00046 bool eval( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, double& result)
00047 {
00048   double d = det(T);
00049   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00050     result = 0.0;
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM> T_inv = 1/d * adj(T);
00054   pluseq_scaled_I( T_inv, -1.0 );
00055   result = sqr_Frobenius(T_inv);
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00060                                    double& result, 
00061                                    MsqError& )
00062 {
00063   return eval( T, result );
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00067                                    double& result, 
00068                                    MsqError& )
00069 {
00070   return eval( T, result );
00071 }
00072 
00074 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00075                                              double& result,
00076                                              MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00077                                              MsqError& err )
00078 {
00079   const double tau = det(T);
00080   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00081     result = 0.0;
00082     return false;
00083   }
00084   
00085   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00086   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00087   result = it*(it*sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0*trace(T)) + 2.0;
00088   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00089   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00090   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= it;
00091   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= it;
00092   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(trace(T)-it*sqr_Frobenius(T))*adjt;
00093   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00094   return true;
00095 }
00096 
00098 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00099                                              double& result,
00100                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00101                                              MsqError& err )
00102 {
00103   const double tau = det(T);
00104   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00105     result = 0.0;
00106     return false;
00107   }
00108   
00109   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = adj(T);
00110   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00111   result = it*(it*sqr_Frobenius(adjt) - 2.0*trace(adjt)) + 3.0;
00112   
00113   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00114   deriv_wrt_T *= sqr_Frobenius(T);
00115   deriv_wrt_T -= T * transpose(T) * T;
00116   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00117   
00118   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(trace(adjt)-it*sqr_Frobenius(adjt))*transpose(adjt);
00119 
00120   double f = trace(T) * it;
00121   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= f;
00122   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= f;
00123   deriv_wrt_T(2,2) -= f;
00124   
00125   deriv_wrt_T += it*transpose(T);
00126 
00127   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00128   return true;
00129 }
00130 
00131 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00132                                              double& result,
00133                                              MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00134                                              MsqMatrix<2,2> second[3],
00135                                              MsqError& err )
00136 {
00137   const double tau = det(T);
00138   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00139     result = 0.0;
00140     return false;
00141   }
00142   
00143   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00144   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00145   result = it*(it*sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0*trace(T)) + 2.0;
00146   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00147   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00148   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= it;
00149   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= it;
00150   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(trace(T)-it*sqr_Frobenius(T))*adjt;
00151   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00152   
00153   set_scaled_outer_product( second, it*it*it*(6*it*sqr_Frobenius(T) - 4*trace(T)), adjt );
00154   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 2*it*it );
00155   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, 2*it*it*(trace(T) - it*sqr_Frobenius(T)) );
00156   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -4*it*it*it, T, adjt );
00157   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product_I( second, 2*it*it, adjt );
00158   
00159   return true;
00160 }
00161 
00162 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00163                                              double& result,
00164                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00165                                              MsqMatrix<3,3> second[6],
00166                                              MsqError& err )
00167 {
00168   const double tau = det(T);
00169   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00170     result = 0.0;
00171     return false;
00172   }
00173   
00174   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = adj(T);
00175   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00176   const double nadjt = sqr_Frobenius(adjt);
00177   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00178   const double tadjT = trace(adjt);
00179   result = it*(it*nadjt - 2.0*tadjT) + 3.0;
00180   
00181   const MsqMatrix<3,3> TTtT = T * transpose(T) * T;
00182   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00183   deriv_wrt_T *= nT;
00184   deriv_wrt_T -= TTtT;
00185   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00186  
00187   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(tadjT-it*nadjt)*transpose(adjt);
00188 
00189   const double tT = trace(T);
00190   double f = tT * it;
00191   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= f;
00192   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= f;
00193   deriv_wrt_T(2,2) -= f;
00194   
00195   deriv_wrt_T += it*transpose(T);
00196 
00197   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00198   
00199   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( second, it*it, T );
00200 
00201   const double yf = -it*it*it*it;
00202   const double sf = -2;
00203   const double zf = -it*it*sf;
00204 
00205   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, yf*2*nadjt*tau + zf*tadjT, T );
00206   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, yf*-6*nadjt - 2*zf*tadjT*it, transpose(adjt) );
00207   MsqMatrix<3,3> dnadj_dT = 2 * (nT * T - TTtT);
00208   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, yf * 2 * tau, dnadj_dT, transpose(adjt) );
00209   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_tr_adj( second, sf * it );
00210   MsqMatrix<3,3> dtradj_dT = -transpose(T);
00211   dtradj_dT(0,0) += tT;
00212   dtradj_dT(1,1) += tT;
00213   dtradj_dT(2,2) += tT;
00214   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, zf, dtradj_dT, transpose(adjt) );
00215 
00216   return true;
00217 }
